column4: can sb help me? I followed the steps on https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FirefoxNewVersion but I can't run firefox. When I start it in the konsole i get this error: ./firefox-bin: error while loading shared libraries: libgtk-x11-2.0.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
seveas: but that's firefox 1.07 and not 1.5
